description.english: You made the first choice.
description.french: Vous avez fait votre premier choix.
description.italian: Hai fatto la tua prima scelta.
description.german: Du hast die erste Entscheidung getroffen.
description.spanish: Toma tu primera decisión.
description.brazilian: Você fez sua primeira escolha.
description.schinese: 你做出了第一个抉择。
description.japanese: あなたは最初の選択をしました。

description.english: Play a game to ease your mind.
description.french: Jouez à un jeu pour vous apaiser.
description.italian: Gioca per rilassarti.
description.german: Spiele ein Spiel, um dich abzulenken.
description.spanish: Juega a algo para calmar tu mente.
description.brazilian: Jogue um jogo para acalmar sua mente.
description.turkish: Kafanı rahatlatmak için bir oyun oyna.
description.schinese: 玩局游戏，平复心情。
description.japanese: 落ち着くためにゲームをする。

description.english: Listen to Anna and search.
description.french: Écoutez Anna et cherchez.
description.italian: Ascolta Anna e perlustra.
description.german: Höre auf Anna und suche nach Simon.
description.spanish: Haz caso a Anna y busca a Simon.
description.brazilian: Ouça a Anna e procure.
description.schinese: 听从安娜的建议，展开搜寻。
description.japanese: アンナの声を頼りに探索する。

description.english: Listen to Nick and go get help.
description.french: Écoutez Nick et allez chercher de l'aide.
description.italian: Ascolta Nick e vai a chiedere aiuto.
description.german: Höre auf Nick und hole Hilfe.
description.spanish: Haz caso a Nick y ve a buscar ayuda.
description.brazilian: Ouça o Nick e busque ajuda.
description.russian: Послушать Ника и пойти за помощью.
description.turkish: Nick'i dinle ve gidip yardım bul.
description.schinese: 听从尼克的警告，即刻求援。
description.japanese: ニックの言葉に従い、助けを呼びに行く。

description.english: Scream for Anna's help.
description.french: Criez pour obtenir l'aide d'Anna.
description.italian: Urla per chiedere aiuto ad Anna
description.german: Rufe nach Anna.
description.spanish: Grita para pedir ayuda a Anna.
description.brazilian: Grite pela ajuda de Anna.
description.schinese: 呼喊安娜前来帮忙。
description.japanese: アンナを助けるために叫ぶ。

description.english: Scream for Nick's help.
description.french: Criez pour obtenir l'aide de Nick.
description.italian: Urla per chiedere aiuto a Nick.
description.german: Rufe nach Nick.
description.spanish: Grita para pedir ayuda a Nick.
description.brazilian: Grite pela ajuda de Nick.
description.schinese: 呼喊尼克前来帮忙。
description.japanese: ニックを助けるために叫ぶ。

description.english: Anna is lead astray. She is marked by the Witch.
description.french: Anna est égarée. Elle est marquée par la sorcière.
description.italian: Anna è alla deriva. È stata marchiata dalla Strega.
description.german: Anna wird in die Irre geführt. Sie wird von der Hexe gezeichnet.
description.spanish: Haz que Anna se pierda y quede marcada por la bruja.
description.brazilian: Anna cai na armadilha. Ela é marcada pela Bruxa.
description.russian: Анна сбита с пути. Она помечена Ведьмой.
description.turkish: Anna yoldan saptı. Cadı tarafından damgalandı.
description.schinese: 安娜被引入迷途。她被女巫标记了。
description.japanese: アンナは道を外れ、魔女に刻印される。
description.koreana: 안나가 길을 잃는다. 마녀에게 표식이 찍힌다.

description.english: Experience the dinner by drinking the water.
description.french: Découvrez le dîner en buvant l'eau.
description.italian: Cena con loro bevendo l'acqua.
description.german: Trinke das Wasser und durchlebe das Dinner.
description.spanish: Bébete el agua para experimentar la cena.
description.brazilian: Experiencie o jantar bebendo a água.
description.schinese: 饮下这杯水，亲历这场晚宴。
description.japanese: 水を飲んで晩餐を体験する。

description.english: Accept the Witch's deal.
description.french: Acceptez le marché de la sorcière.
description.italian: Accetta il patto della Strega
description.german: Gehe den Pakt mit der Hexe ein.
description.spanish: Acepta el trato de la bruja.
description.brazilian: Aceite a proposta da Bruxa.
description.schinese: 接受女巫的交易。
description.japanese: 魔女の契約を受け入れる。

description.english: Discover the lore of the Witch.
description.french: Découvrez l'histoire de la sorcière.
description.italian: Scopri la storia della Strega.
description.german: Entdecke die Geschichte der Hexe.
description.spanish: Descubre la historia de la bruja.
description.brazilian: Descubra a história da Bruxa.
description.schinese: 揭开女巫的故事。
description.japanese: 魔女の伝承を解き明かす。

displayName.japanese: 呪われし者に導かれて

description.english: Daniel leads Simon to the Witch's heart.
description.french: Daniel amène Simon au cœur de la sorcière.
description.italian: Daniel conduce Simon fino al cuore della Strega.
description.german: Daniel führt Simon zum Herz der Hexe.
description.spanish: Haz que Daniel guíe a Simon al corazón de la bruja.
description.brazilian: Daniel guia Simon ao coração da Bruxa.
description.russian: Дэниел приводит Саймона к сердцу Ведьмы.
description.schinese: 丹尼尔带领西蒙去寻找女巫之心。
description.japanese: ダニエルがサイモンを魔女の心臓へ導く。

description.english: Anna is corrupted by the Witch.
description.french: Anna est corrompue par la sorcière.
description.italian: Anna viene corrotta dalla Strega.
description.german: Anna wird von der Hexe korrumpiert.
description.spanish: Haz que Anna sea corrompida por la bruja.
description.brazilian: Anna é corrompida pela Bruxa.
description.schinese: 安娜被女巫腐化。
description.japanese: アンナは魔女に侵される。

description.english: Nick kills Tom.
description.french: Nick tue Tom.
description.italian: Nick uccide Tom.
description.german: Nick tötet Tom.
description.spanish: Haz que Nick mate a Tom.
description.brazilian: Nick mata Tom.
description.schinese: 尼克杀死了汤姆。
description.japanese: ニックがトムを殺す。

description.english: Nick traps Tom. He leaves the dungeon alive.
description.french: Nick piège Tom. Il quitte le donjon en vie.
description.italian: Nick intrappola Tom. Lascia la caverna vivo.
description.german: Nick schließt Tom ein. Er entkommt lebend aus dem Kerker.
description.spanish: Haz que Nick atrape a Tom y salga de la mazmorra con vida.
description.brazilian: Nick prende Tom. Ele escapa da masmorra com vida.
description.russian: Ник запирает Тома. Он покидает подземелье живым.
description.turkish: Nick, Tom'u hapseder. Zindandan canlı çıkar.
description.schinese: 尼克困住了汤姆，他独自逃出了地牢。
description.japanese: ニックはトムを閉じ込める。トムは生きたまま地下牢を出る。
description.koreana: 닉이 톰을 함정에 빠뜨린다. 닉은 살아서 동굴을 빠져나온다.

description.english: Laura kills Ida.
description.french: Laura tue Ida.
description.italian: Laura uccide Ida.
description.german: Laura tötet Ida.
description.spanish: Haz que Laura mate a Ida.
description.brazilian: Laura mata Ida.
description.schinese: 劳拉杀死了艾达。
description.japanese: ローラがアイダを殺す。

description.english: Nick is corrupted by the Witch.
description.french: Nick est corrompu par la sorcière.
description.italian: Nick viene corrotto dalla Strega.
description.german: Nick wird von der Hexe korrumpiert.
description.spanish: Haz que Nick sea corrompido por la bruja.
description.brazilian: Nick é corrompido pela Bruxa.
description.schinese: 尼克被女巫腐化。
description.japanese: ニックは魔女に侵される。

description.english: Simon is corrupted by the Witch.
description.french: Simon est corrompu par la sorcière.
description.italian: Simon viene corrotto dalla Strega.
description.german: Simon wird von der Hexe korrumpiert.
description.spanish: Haz que Simon sea corrompido por la bruja.
description.brazilian: Simon é corrompido pela Bruxa.
description.schinese: 西蒙被女巫腐化。
description.japanese: サイモンは魔女に侵される。

description.english: Anna starts the ritual but doesn't manage to kill Simon.
description.french: Anna débute le rituel mais ne parvient pas à tuer Simon.
description.italian: Anna inizia il rito ma non riesce a uccidere Simon.
description.german: Anna startet das Ritual, aber kann Simon nicht töten.
description.spanish: Haz que Anna comience el ritual, pero no logre matar a Simon.
description.brazilian: Anna começa o ritual mas não consegue matar Simon.
description.russian: Анна начинает ритуал, но не может убить Саймона.
description.turkish: Anna ayine başlar ama Simon'ı öldürmeyi başaramaz.
description.schinese: 安娜启动了仪式，但未能杀死西蒙。
description.japanese: アンナは儀式を始めるが、サイモンを殺しきれない。
description.koreana: 안나가 의식을 시작하지만 사이먼을 죽이지 못한다.

description.english: Anna fights off the witch. Laura stabs the heart.
description.french: Anna affronte la sorcière. Laura poignarde le cœur.
description.italian: Anna lotta contro la Strega. Laura trafigge il cuore.
description.german: Anna bricht den Bann der Hexe. Laura ersticht das Herz.
description.spanish: Haz que Anna se enfrente a la bruja y Laura apuñale el corazón.
description.brazilian: Anna luta contra a Bruxa. Laura apunhala o coração.
description.russian: Анна дает отпор Ведьме. Лора наносит удар в сердце.
description.turkish: Anna, Cadı'yı defeder. Laura kalbi bıçaklar.
description.schinese: 安娜击退了女巫。劳拉刺穿了女巫之心。
description.japanese: アンナは魔女を退ける。ローラが心臓を突き刺す。
description.koreana: 안나가 마녀를 격퇴한다. 로라가 심장을 찌른다.

description.english: Anna dies trying to fend off the Witch. Laura stabs the heart.
description.french: Anna meurt en essayant de repousser la sorcière. Laura poignarde le cœur.
description.italian: Anna muore nel tentativo di respingere la Strega. Laura trafigge il cuore.
description.german: Anna stirbt beim Versuch, den Bann der Hexe zu brechen. Laura ersticht das Herz.
description.spanish: Haz que Anna muera enfrentándose a la bruja y que Laura apuñale el corazón.
description.brazilian: Anna morre tentando se defender da Bruxa. Laura apunhala o coração.
description.russian: Анна умирает, сражаясь с Ведьмой. Лора наносит удар в сердце.
description.turkish: Anna, Cadı'yı savuşturmaya çalışırken ölür. Laura kalbi bıçaklar.
description.schinese: 安娜为抵挡女巫壮烈牺牲。劳拉刺穿了女巫之心。
description.japanese: アンナは魔女を退けようとして命を落とす。ローラが心臓を突き刺す。
description.koreana: 마녀를 쫓아내려던 안나가 죽는다. 로라가 마녀의 심장을 찌른다.

description.english: Laura stabs the heart and fends off Anna.
description.french: Laura poignarde le cœur et repousse Anna.
description.italian: Laura trafigge il cuore e respinge Anna.
description.german: Laura ersticht das Herz und wehrt Anna ab.
description.spanish: Haz que Laura apuñale el corazón y se enfrente a Anna.
description.brazilian: Laura apunhala o coração e se defende contra Anna.
description.russian: Лора пронзает сердце и дает отпор Анне.
description.turkish: Laura kalbi bıçaklar ve Anna'yı savuşturur.
description.schinese: 劳拉刺穿了女巫之心，同时击退了安娜。
description.japanese: ローラが心臓を突き刺し、アンナを退ける。

description.english: Laura stabs the heart. Anna dies in the process.
description.french: Laura poignarde le cœur. Anna meurt en court de route.
description.italian: Laura trafigge il cuore. Anna muore.
description.german: Laura ersticht das Herz. Anna stirbt dabei.
description.spanish: Haz que Laura apuñale el corazón y Anna muera en el proceso.
description.brazilian: Laura apunhala o coração. Anna morre no processo.
description.russian: Лора пронзает сердце. Анна погибает в процессе.
description.turkish: Laura kalbi bıçaklar. Anna bu uğurda ölür.
description.schinese: 劳拉刺穿了女巫之心。安娜在此过程中殒命。
description.japanese: ローラが心臓を突き刺し、その過程でアンナは命を落とす。
description.koreana: 로라가 심장을 찌른다. 그 과정에서 안나가 사망한다.

description.english: Nick, Anna and Simon all survive in one playthrough.
description.french: Nick, Anna et Simon survivent tous au cours de la même partie.
description.italian: Nick, Anna e Simon sopravvivono nella stessa partita.
description.german: Nick, Anna und Simon überleben im gleichen Playthrough.
description.spanish: Haz que Nick, Anna y Simon sobrevivan en una sola partida.
description.brazilian: Nick, Anna e Simon sobrevivem em uma partida.
description.russian: Ник, Анна и Саймон выживают в одном прохождении.
description.turkish: Tek bir oynatışta Nick, Anna ve Simon'ın hepsi hayatta kalır.
description.schinese: 尼克、安娜与西蒙在一次通关中全部生还。
description.japanese: ニック、アンナ、サイモンが1周のプレイですべて生存する。
description.koreana: 닉, 안나, 사이먼 전원이 같은 플레이에서 살아남는다.

description.english: Discover all endings.
description.french: Découvrez toutes les fins.
description.italian: Scopri tutti i finali.
description.german: Entdecke alle Enden.
description.spanish: Descubre todos los finales.
description.brazilian: Descubra todos os finais.
description.schinese: 解锁所有结局。
description.japanese: すべてのエンディングを楽しむ。
